name: Introduction to Philosophy
description: An introduction to the field of philosophy, covering the major philosophical questions, theories, and concepts.

name: History of Philosophy
description: A survey of Western philosophy from the ancient Greeks through the 20th century, covering major thinkers and theories.

name: Philosophical Logic
description: A course introducing formal logic and its applications to philosophical arguments.

name: Philosophy of Mind
description: An introduction to the philosophical questions concerning the nature of the mind and the relationship between the mind and the body.

name: Epistemology
description: A course covering the philosophical study of knowledge, including theories of justification, truth, evidence, and belief.
